Standard.Name: AudioText Play_narrator_311020: A heavy Thunderstorm is lowering over your Settlement!
AudioText Play_narrator_311021: A Thunderstorm is threatening your Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311022: A Thunderstorm is brewing on an Island.
AudioText Play_narrator_311023: A Thunderstorm is raging on another player's Island.
AudioText Play_narrator_311024: The Thunderstorm has ceased.
AudioText Play_narrator_311025: The Thunderstorm has subsided.
AudioText Play_narrator_311026: A Sandstorm has appeared over your Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311027: A Sandstorm is raging over your Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311028: A Tornado is threatening the Island world.
AudioText Play_narrator_311029: A Tornado has been sighted!
AudioText Play_narrator_311030: Thank God the Sandstorm has ceased!
AudioText Play_narrator_311031: The Sandstorm has subsided!
AudioText Play_narrator_311032: A Tornado is threatening to devastate your Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311033: A Tornado is threatening your Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311036: The Tornado has moved on!
AudioText Play_narrator_311037: The Tornado no longer poses a threat!
AudioText Play_narrator_311060: A Thunderstorm is brewing on an Island!
AudioText Play_narrator_311061: A Thunderstorm is moving over the Island world!
AudioText Play_narrator_311062: The Thunderstorm on this Island has ceased.
AudioText Play_narrator_311065: The Thunderstorm has ceased.
AudioText Play_narrator_311066: The Thunderstorm has subsided.
AudioText Play_narrator_311067: The Sandstorm has ceased.
AudioText Play_narrator_311068: The Sandstorm has subsided.
AudioText Play_narrator_311504: Bandits have come to live in your Settlement.
AudioText Play_narrator_311505: Scallywags and ragamuffins have spread in your Settlement.
AudioText Play_narrator_311506: The Bandits have left your Island.
AudioText Play_narrator_311507: Law and order has now been restored to your Settlement!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250400: A Volcano has become active on an island!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250401: A Volcano is threatening to erupt!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250402: The Volcano on your island has become active!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250403: The Volcano on your island is threatening to erupt!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250404: A Volcano has erupted!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250405: A Volcanic eruption is laying waste to an island!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250406: The Volcano on your island has erupted!
AudioText Play_narrator_40250407: A Volcanic eruption is threatening your Settlement!
